page.title: 12Religion in the Felton Area
page.content: The three churches in the area are the Church of St. Michael at Felton, Holy Trinity Church at Preston Wynne and St. James' Church at Ocle Pychard. Sevices are held every fortnight and at Christmas, Easter, Harvest Festival and Whitsuntide. Although the habit of regular attendance has largely ceased, most people in the region are communicants of the Anglican Church. In the majority of families cremation is chosen more often than burial in the churchyard. Fund-raising for the churches is by donation, fetes, flower festivals and coffee mornings. People are ready to support their church if asked.
